price: 74. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Mayee, waxaan hellay aabbayaashayadii hore oo sidaas falaya.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
